name: Drum Dashboard
upgrade_notice: We have up added WP Rest API integration!!
author: Drum Creative

sections.description: This plugin adds a set of panels in the dashboard for the client.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire drum-dashboard folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
• v1.0 - fist release of plugin
  • v.1.1 - We have up added WP Rest API integration for the Account Managers
  • v1.1.2 - Cleaned up the code to make it more
